messages.subject: History and Location of the Numazawa family
messages.msgSnippet: Numazawa family adopted Fujita Tatsuo (the third and youngest son of the Fujita family) read more in the FILES section look for the folder on Saitou Hajime
messages.messageBody:
Numazawa family adopted Fujita Tatsuo (the third and youngest son of
the Fujita family) read more in the "FILES" section look for the
folder on Saitou Hajime

We discussed the Numazawas before but this is a bit more info

http://hajime3.hp.infoseek.co.jp/cgi-bin/bbs_06/bbs_06.cgi
